results.title: A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema
results.text_hl: We describe a rare case of a 58-year-old female with a history of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for the past three years and presented with recurrent episodes of @DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@, @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, and @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ around the same time she started taking the drug.

citations.NLM: Pirzada S, Raza B, Mankani AA, Naveed B. A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema Cureus. 2023 Oct;15(10):e47739. PMID: 38022184
citations.BibTeX: @article{38022184, title={A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema}, author={Pirzada S and Raza B and Mankani AA and Naveed B}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={10}, pages={e47739}}

results.title: Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial.
results.text_hl: We performed a randomized-controlled trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ alone (an ACEI) or in combination with @CHEMICAL_Verapamil @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014700 @@@verapamil@@@ (a CCB) as a therapy for @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@HTN@@@) and urinary @GENE_ALB @GENE_213 @@@albumin@@@ @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@ ratio (UACR) (30-300 mg/g) also to evaluate their effect on UACR, the angiogenic proteins: @GENE_ANGPT2 @GENE_285 @@@Angiopoietin 2@@@ (@GENE_ANGPT2 @GENE_285 @@@Ang-2@@@) and @GENE_COL18A1 @GENE_80781 @@@Endostatin@@@ (@GENE_COL18A1 @GENE_80781 @@@EST@@@).

citations.NLM: Salem M, Sallam AM, Abdel-Aleem E, El-Mesallamy HO. Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial. Horm Metab Res. 2021 Jul;53(7):470-477. PMID: 34282598
citations.BibTeX: @article{34282598, title={Effect of Lisinopril and Verapamil on Angiopoietin 2 and Endostatin in Hypertensive Diabetic Patients with Nephropathy: A Randomized Trial.}, author={Salem M and Sallam AM and Abdel-Aleem E and El-Mesallamy HO}, journal={Horm Metab Res}, volume={53}, number={7}, pages={470-477}}

results.title: Antidiabetic Potential of Stem Bark Extract of Enantia chlorantha and Lack of Modulation of Its Therapeutic Efficacy in Diabetic Rats Co-Administered with Lisinopril.
results.text_hl: This study validates the antidiabetic efficacy of Enantia chlorantha stem bark and the possible therapeutic implications of the co-administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and E. chlorantha in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ibrahim LB, Idowu PF, Mose SOA, Alabi MA, Ajani EO. Antidiabetic Potential of Stem Bark Extract of Enantia chlorantha and Lack of Modulation of Its Therapeutic Efficacy in Diabetic Rats Co-Administered with Lisinopril. Acta Chim Slov. 2021 Mar;68(1):127. PMID: 34057517
citations.BibTeX: @article{34057517, title={Antidiabetic Potential of Stem Bark Extract of Enantia chlorantha and Lack of Modulation of Its Therapeutic Efficacy in Diabetic Rats Co-Administered with Lisinopril.}, author={Ibrahim LB and Idowu PF and Mose SOA and Alabi MA and Ajani EO}, journal={Acta Chim Slov}, volume={68}, number={1}, pages={127}}

results.title: Therapeutic effects of lisinopril and empagliflozin in a mouse model of hypertension-accelerated diabetic kidney disease.
results.text_hl: Therapeutic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_empagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C570240 @@@empagliflozin@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@-accelerated @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic kidney disease@@@.

Therapeutic effects of lisinopril and empagliflozin in a mouse model of hypertension-accelerated diabetic kidney disease. Am J Physiol Renal Physiol. 2021 Aug 1;321(2):F149-F161. PMID: 34180715

results.title: Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ improves @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@hypertensive NIDDM@@@ subjects with @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Nielsen FS, Rossing P, Gall MA, Smidt UM, Chen JW, Sato A, Parving HH. Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy. Scand J Clin Lab Invest. 1997 Aug;57(5):427-34. PMID: 9279969

results.title: Lisinopril. A review of its pharmacology and use in the management of the complications of diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: In summary, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ lowers blood pressure and produces a renoprotective effect in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@IDDM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@NIDDM@@@ without detriment to glycaemic control or @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profiles.

citations.NLM: Goa KL, Haria M, Wilde MI. Lisinopril. A review of its pharmacology and use in the management of the complications of diabetes mellitus. Drugs. 1997 Jun;53(6):1081-105. PMID: 9179532
citations.BibTeX: @article{9179532, title={Lisinopril. A review of its pharmacology and use in the management of the complications of diabetes mellitus.}, author={Goa KL and Haria M and Wilde MI}, journal={Drugs}, volume={53}, number={6}, pages={1081-105}}

results.title: Impact of lisinopril and atenolol on kidney function in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on kidney function in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@hypertensive NIDDM@@@ subjects with @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Nielsen FS, Rossing P, Gall MA, Skøtt P, Smidt UM, Parving HH. Impact of lisinopril and atenolol on kidney function in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy. Diabetes. 1994 Sep;43(9):1108-13. PMID: 8070610

results.title: Effect of Eplerenone, a Selective Aldosterone Blocker, on the Development of Diabetic Nephropathy in Type 2 Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Eplerenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077545 @@@Eplerenone@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ combination showed additional benefits on @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetic nephropathy@@@ compared to monotherapy of each drug.

results.title: Effect of antihypertensive therapy on renal artery structure in type 2 diabetic rats with hypertension.
results.text_hl: We have previously demonstrated that antihypertensive treatment with @CHEMICAL_Doxazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017292 @@@doxazosin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Doxazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017292 @@@DZN@@@), an alpha-adrenergic blocker, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@LIS@@@), an ACE inhibitor, reverse @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@glomerular sclerosis@@@ in corpulent spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Reddi AS, Nimmagadda VR, Arora R. Effect of antihypertensive therapy on renal artery structure in type 2 diabetic rats with hypertension. Hypertension. 2001 May;37(5):1273-8. PMID: 11358940
